objects.text:
• Premium Canvas Material
• Navy Blue Classic Design
• Cushioned Comfort Insole
• Durable White Rubber Sole

product_details.name: Classic Canvas Comfort: Urban Casual Sneakers in Navy Blue
product_details.description:
• Premium quality canvas material for breathable comfort
• Sleek navy blue design perfect for casual and smart-casual outfits
• Durable white rubber sole with excellent grip
• Metallic eyelets with matching navy laces for secure fit
• Lightweight construction for all-day wear
• Classic low-top silhouette with minimalist styling
• Cushioned insole for enhanced comfort
• Versatile design suitable for both men and women
• Easy-to-clean canvas exterior
• Perfect for daily wear, casual outings, and weekend activities

banner_details:
The banner is a promotional design divided into four quadrants, each using a bold, contrasting color. The top-left quadrant features a solid dark blue background with large, bold, white uppercase text (`heading`) and a thin, sleek subtext (`tagline`) in a light orange hue. The top-right section displays a high-resolution product image (`product_image`) of stylish navy blue canvas shoes set against a slightly brighter blue background.

The bottom-left quadrant, filled with vibrant orange, includes a bullet-point product description (`description`) in dark gray, a bold white price tag (`price`), and a solid dark blue CTA button (`cta_background`) labeled with compelling white text (`cta`). The bottom-right quadrant is light orange with a centered promotional subheading (`subheading`) in dark text and decorative dot elements.

Color Palette:
- Dark Blue: #1A3A80
- Mid Blue: #2A4A90
- Orange: #FF6B00
- Light Orange/Peach: #FFB566
- White: #FFFFFF
- Charcoal/Dark Gray: #333333
product_color: The product image features a pair of canvas sneakers in a deep navy blue tone, which stands out as the dominant color. The canvas upper is a rich Midnight Blue (#1F3A93), blending smoothly with slightly lighter stitching and laces in Indigo (#2C3E73). White rubber soles (#F5F5F5) provide contrast and highlight the sleek, casual nature of the shoes. Metallic eyelets in Silver Gray (#C0C0C0) add subtle accents without overpowering the look. The color transitions are clean and defined, drawing attention to the shoe's structure while maintaining a minimalistic aesthetic. This refined palette is perfect for a modern and stylish advertisement banner.
